downloadTitle: Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 Distributed Scan Management Active Directory Schema update
downloadDescription: This download contains Active Directory schema updates to enable Distributed Scan Management in a Windows Server 2003 or Windows Server 2008 environment.
detailsSection:
This download contains Active Directory schema updates to enable Distributed Scan Management in a Windows Server 2003 or Windows Server 2008 environment. 
It enables creation of scan process objects within active directory to support Windows Server 2008 R2 Distributed Scan Servers in a Windows Server 2003 or Windows Server 2008 environment.
systemRequirementsSection: Windows Server 2003, Windows Server 2003 R2 and Windows Server 2008 Operating system. (Both x64 and x86)
installInstructionSection:
1. Make sure you are member of "schema admin" or "enterprise admin"
  2. Download the ZIP file by clicking on the Download button above.
  3. Extract the ldf file module to a folder on your local machine.
  4. Open a command prompt.
  5. Import the file using the following command line (replace “DomainName” with your fully qualitified domain path)
    • ldifde /i /v /f DistributedScanManagement.ldf /c DC=X "DC=DomainName,DC=com"
